TEXT.TITLE: HYUNDAI HAS HIGHER MARCH DOMESTIC CAR SALES
TEXT.BODY: Hyundai Motor America, a unit of Hyundai Motor Co of South Korea, said domestic car sales during the month of March rose to 19,502 compared witrh 10,432 during March last year. Year-to-date car sales rose to 56,164 from 11,020 during the same period last year, the company said. Hyundai began selling cars in the United States last February 20. Reuter
